actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor

official_title: A bill to authorize the appointment of certain additional Assistant Secretaries of Labor, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Redesignates the Under Secretary of Labor as the Deputy Secretary of Labor and increases the compensation for such position. Increases the number of Assistant Secretaries of Labor from five to ten.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the appointment of certain additional Assistant Secretaries of Labor, and for other purposes.
